# column(of:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the column number in which the given matrix is located.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func column(of matrix: NSMatrix) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **matrix**: The matrix for which to return the column number.

## Return Value

The index of the column in which the specified matrix appears.

## Deprecated

- **matrix(inColumn:)**: Returns the matrix located in the specified column.
- **matrixClass()**: Returns the matrix class used in the browser’s columns.
- **setMatrixClass(_:)**: Sets the matrix class to be used in the browser’s columns.
